articles.title: See Brian Stelter's message on final 'Reliable Sources' show  - CNN Video
articles.description: Anchor Brian Stelter says goodbye on the final episode of "Reliable Sources with Brian Stelter." The show has aired on CNN in various iterations for 30 years.

articles.author: Casey Tolan, Curt Devine and Drew Griffin, CNN
articles.title: Massive dark money windfall: New conservative group got $1.6 billion from single donor
articles.description: A new group led by a prominent conservative lawyer has received $1.6 billion from one donor -- the largest single contribution to a politically focused nonprofit that's ever been made public, and a fortune that could be used to fuel right-wing interests.

articles.title: Quiet quitting: Engineer says she 'quiet quit' her job. Hear what that means - CNN Video
articles.description: Page West, a former engineering consultant, discusses with CNN's Michael Smerconish why she "quiet quit" her job.

articles.title: Floodwaters overtake cars and trucks in drought-plagued Dallas as a summer's worth of rain falls in a day
articles.description: More flash flooding threatens the Dallas area after cars and trucks were inundated early Monday by sudden, climate crisis-fueled storms that stunned parts of Texas afflicted this summer by "flash drought."

articles.title: Dr. Fauci announces he is stepping down from current roles - CNN Video
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci is departing his roles as the director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases and as chief medical officer to President Joe Biden. CNN's Arlette Saenz reports.

articles.title: You asked, we’re answering: Your top questions about Covid-19 and vaccines
articles.description: CNN readers ask sharp questions about coronavirus every day. We’re answering some of the most popular questions and busting myths with statistics and facts.

articles.author: Karl de Vries, CNN
articles.title: Fauci to depart Biden administration in December
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci on Monday announced that he will be leaving government work at the end of the year.

articles.author: Amanda Sealy
articles.title: Pfizer and BioNTech seek FDA authorization for updated Covid-19 booster
articles.description: Pfizer and BioNTech have submitted their application to the US Food and Drug Administration for emergency use authorization of their bivalent Covid-19 vaccine for use in people age 12 and older, the companies said in a statement on Monday.

articles.author: Brenda Goodman, CNN Health
articles.title: Overlapping emergencies strain the nation's public health workforce and threaten critical vaccination campaigns
articles.description: After almost three years of contending with vaccine hesitancy, politics and a global pandemic, the nation's public health workers are frayed and leaving their posts. Now, these depleted agencies are being asked to tackle new threats like monkeypox without add…
